overview:
Bill Johnson is the founder of Crowdfund Films, LLC, an entertainment entity located in Los Angeles, California, with satellite offices in Lafayette, Louisiana.

He has worked in the entertainment field for thirty years, producing feature films, television, and webisodes for major studios and independents, with titles such as “Contraband”, “Secretariat”, “I Love You, Man”, and “A Walk To Remember” to his credit.

He is a member of the Producer’s Guild of America, the Director’s Guild of America, and the Screen Actor’s Guild of America.
